attributes.action: STOP CAMERON TWO TIER PENSION SYSTEM AS IT IS NOT RIGHT FOR TODAYS PENSIONERS
attributes.additional_details: To have a two tier Pension which Mr Cameron wants is unfair and against our human rights to the people already drawing there Pensions, when immigrants coming to Britain will get a better pension then Pensioners of 65 years of age and older who have paid in to the system all of there working lives.
